result.eng: Have you ever seen such a thing?
result.ga: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéid
result.orig: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéid
result.html: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéidHave you ever seen such a thing?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfaca tú riaṁ a leiṫéidHave you ever seen such a thing?

result.html: An bhfaca tú a mháthairHave you seen his mother?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfaca tú a ṁáṫairHave you seen his mother?

result.eng: I regret very much that I never saw the play.
result.ga: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamh
result.orig: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamh
result.html: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamhI regret very much that I never saw the play.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an trua dom naċ ḃfaca mé an dráma riaṁI regret very much that I never saw the play.
